001package imagingbook.pub.morphology;
002
003import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
004
005public class BinaryOpening extends BinaryMorphologyFilter {
006        
007        public BinaryOpening() {
008                super();
009        }
010        
011        public BinaryOpening(byte[][] H) {
012                super(H);
013        }
014
015        @Override
016        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor ip) {
017                new BinaryErosion(H).applyTo(ip);       // erode(ip, H);
018                new BinaryDilation(H).applyTo(ip);      //dilate(ip, H);
019        }
020
021}
